threads.title: The moon has a dark side, CMV.

comments.message: That's what they don't want you to know, so welcome to the machine.

comments.message: Doesn't matter either way. Just tryin' to get my hands on your cash.

comments.message: Well, there certainly is a dark moon rising.....

comments.message: It's a freaky moon age daydream, oh yeah.
